select MS_CARGO_GROUP.MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , MS_CARGO_GROUP.CARGO_GROUP_NAME , MS_CARGO_GROUP.RENEW_DATE , MS_CARGO_GROUP.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_CARGO_GROUP.TS , MS_CARGO_GROUP.DELETE_FLAG , MS_CARGO_GROUP.SEND_FLAG , MS_CARGO_GROUP.VESSEL_ID , MS_CARGO_GROUP.DATA_NO , MS_CARGO_GROUP.USER_KEY
from MS_CARGO_GROUP where MS_CARGO_GROUP.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_CARGO_GROUP ( MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , CARGO_GROUP_NAME , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , USER_KEY, DATA_NO, TS ) VALUES ( nextval('SEQ_MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID'), :CARGO_GROUP_NAME , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :USER_KEY , :DATA_NO, :TS )

UPDATE MS_CARGO_GROUP SET CARGO_GROUP_NAME = :CARGO_GROUP_NAME , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY
WHERE MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID = :MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID AND TS = :TS
